segments.text: Excuse me , could I ask a favour ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me where the canteen is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I can take you there actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I don't want to trouble you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's fine . I was heading there anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
